thread.section_title: Days Hotel London- Waterloo - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Convenient and reasonably priced
thread.title_full: Convenient and reasonably priced - Review of Days Hotel London- Waterloo, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Dale H
title: Convenient and reasonably priced
text: Nearest hotel available within business hotel rate limit for an event. Room was clean and comfortable with plenty of tea and coffee. Check in was efficient and quick and staff very welcoming. Didn't have chance to venture out but pubs closeby have good reviews. Excellent base for visit to the Imperial War Museum. Business trip but would consider seriously for pleasure.
